meanings.definition: Able to be adjusted in size.
meanings.sent1: The resizable window allowed me to make it smaller.
meanings.sent2: The website had a resizable text box for user input.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make the resizable hat fit my head, but it kept changing size!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a resizable painting, growing wider with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The resizable balloon expanded to fill the entire room, surprising everyone.

meanings.sent1: The resizable image on the screen could be made larger with a click.
meanings.sent2: The resizable table allowed for easy customization of its dimensions.
meanings.sent3: The resizable cat bed was a hit with Fluffy, who kept changing its size for fun.
meanings.sent4: His love was like a resizable garden, always adapting to new circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The resizable map zoomed in to show intricate details of the terrain.
